attributes.action: Appoint credible leader for the government coding education initiative
attributes.additional_details:
Lottie Dexter has been appointed to head the coding initiative for the Department for Education, despite having no coding experience at all, as evidenced by her statement that you could "learn how to teach programming in a day".

We demand that you appoint someone credible with a non-trivial degree of programming skill to the position, so that the money invested in this scheme is not wasted.
